text: Teuma taingat janji nyang sudah Yoh masa Kamoe janji meuikat Gata dum meuhat teuma taubah Kamoe buot le buket Tursina U ateuh gata Kamoe peureubah Kamoe yue tacok nyang Kamoe intat Tadeungo beu that nyang Kamoe peugah Ka kamoe deungo meunan jikheun le Maksiet lam ate teuma jipeugah Cit aneuk leumo di jih jipike Keubit si kaphe _jeuheut sileupah Takheun keubit brok iman di gata Meu keunan jiba jiyue peurintah Meunyo cit keubit gata meuiman Teuntee han meunan gata roh salah
